subject: New York City Marathon
September 11 (2001)
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: An extended family representing those who died on United Airlines Flight 93 near Shanksville, Pa., on Sept. 11, 2001, will race the New York City Marathon.
snippet: An extended family representing those who died on United Airlines Flight 93 near Shanksville, Pa., on Sept. 11, 2001, will race the New York City Marathon.
